name: 13th Africa Public Private Partnership Conference
content: The 13th Africa Public Private Partnership Conference, Africa PPP, is under the theme “Accelerating Project Delivery and Partnerships” and has Morocco as the Host Partner of Choice. The event will comprise certified training on PPP and a 2-day conference. It will feature active and upcoming projects in renewable energy, waste to energy, wastewater, bulk water, bulk transport and infrastructure and spotlight new projects in social service PPP’s.
